headline: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) Unveils Quantum-Resistant Controllers With CNSA 2.0 Standards
summary: Microchip Technology (NasdaqGS:MCHP) recently launched the Commercial National Security Algorithm Suite 2.0, aiming to advance quantum-resistant cryptographic standards, which aligns with the company's mission to support evolving security needs. Over the last month, Microchip’s stock price surged 56%, contrasting with broader market gains. This significant increase could be attributed to the heightened focus on post-quantum cryptographic solutions, amidst a favorable trend for technology...

headline: 5 Technology Stocks Powering S&P 500 ETF
summary: The S&P 500 returns to positive territory in 2025, driven by tech stocks. We highlight five tech stocks leading the rally in the ETF.

headline: Microchip Brings Hardware Quantum Resistance to Embedded Controllers
summary: The MEC175xB family features post-quantum cryptography, enhanced security features and low power consumptionCHANDLER, Ariz., May 15, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Driven by advancements in cryptographic research and the need for stronger security measures, the National Security Agency (NSA) introduced the Commercial National Security Algorithm Suite 2.0 (CNSA 2.0) to establish a set of quantum-resistant cryptographic standards.
